My Products

  • {{product.id}} {{product.name}}
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { Product } from '../product'; import { ProductService } from '../product.service'; import { MessageService } from '../message.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-products', templateUrl: './products.component.html', styleUrls: ['./products.component.css'] }) export class ProductsComponent { constructor(private productService: ProductService, private messageService:MessageService) {} products: Product[] = [] // selectedProduct?: Product getProducts(): void { this.productService.getProducts().subscribe(products => this.products = products) } ngOnInit(): void { this.getProducts(); } // onSelect(product:Product): void { // this.selectedProduct = product // this.messageService.add(`ProductsComponent: Selected product id=${product.id}`); // } }
